body: I kinda agree with the first commenter it's kinda getting tiresome, the execution is good but the character set is the same time and time again and it's getting boring and kinda predictable

Come the fuck on, now I’m gettin’ sick of this charade. Makin’ the ladies look FRESH, but gotta put so much effort into making these niggas look like every SINGLE Discord Moderator! F U C K . Just make them faceless, I’m pretty sure there would be LESS complaints about UB if they were fat with little to no facial detail.
